result.html: Lig dom imeachtLet me leave!
result.ponchtml: Lig dom imeaċtLet me leave!

result.eng: She made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ga: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.orig: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.html: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ponchtml: Lig sí osna faoisiṁ nuair a ċonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.

result.eng: She let out a loud scream of laughter.
result.ga: Lig sí liú ard gáire aisti
result.orig: Lig sí liú ard gáire aisti
result.html: Lig sí liú ard gáire aistiShe let out a loud scream of laughter.
result.ponchtml: Lig sí liú ard gáire aistiShe let out a loud scream of laughter.

result.eng: For the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
result.ga: Ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.orig: Ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.html: Ar do bhás ná lig uait éFor the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
result.ponchtml: Ar do ḃás ná lig uait éFor the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
